game.name: Ashes of Immortality II
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A whole new side to the Ashes of Immortality saga! Defeat your enemies and complete sidequests in this compelling 16-bit saga inspired by Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A whole new side to the Ashes of Immortality saga! Defeat your enemies and complete sidequests in this compelling 16-bit saga inspired by Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest.

reviewHighlights.text: Trust me give it a chance
